participant_1.background:
My black and white cat, Cow, is my most valued material possession because he is my best friend and always there for me.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I'm afraid of crashing my model airplane.
I am not close with my parents.
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog and a cat, and they are my best friends.
I take my iguana outside to bask in the sun.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I miss being able to run around in the woods behind my house without a care in the world.
My family is not involved in my career.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
I'm planning on spending some time outside with my dog and cat. How about you?
I'm going to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
That sounds like a great day! I love working out and eating healthy food. I'm not a big fan of Magic Mike, but I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
What's your favorite thing to do outside?
I love taking my dog for walks in the park. We also like to go hiking and camping.
I miss being able to run around in the woods behind my house without a care in the world.
I know what you mean. I miss those days too.
I'm glad we have pets to keep us company.
What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. My family is not involved in my career, but I love my job.
That's awesome! I'm glad you love your job. I'm on my way to the gym now. I'll talk to you later!
Have a good time! I'll talk to you later too.
